column4: Hey, I have a PIII 500Mhz with 256mb ram (non-upgradable) -- DELL Latitude LS; is there anything else I can do to improve performance? Maybe SSD hard-drive?
install xubuntu, or go for a minimal install of ubuntu + lxde, or try a less bloated approach like debian
then dont buy an ssd. try a debian minimal + lxde. it boots on my vbox with 512 of ram in 30-40 seconds
